verses.1: Topa aw, bang tanvei hi lai ding ahi hiam? Kei hong mangngilh paisuak ding na hi hiam? Bang tanvei kei kiang pan na maitang seel ding na hi hiam?
verses.2: Bang tanvei gimna thuakin, sun thapai-in ka lungsim dah ding ahi hiam? Bang tanvei kei tungah ka galte gualzo ding ahi hiam?
verses.3: Topa ka Pasian aw, ngaihsun inla hong dawng in. Ihmu lum kha ding ka hih manin ka mitte hong vaksak in.
verses.4: Ka galte in, “Ama tungah gualzo khin ung,” ci kha ding hi. Kei ka liin manin ka galte nuam kha ding hi.
verses.5: Ahih hangin na itna kip ka muang a, nong hotkhiatna hangin ka lungdam ding hi.
verses.6: Nong hehpihna kicing ahih manin, Topa, la kong sak ding hi.
